verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: In the midst of a Cabinet shake - up and a staff upheaval] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: considered] [ARG1: firing his chief of staff this month and not naming a successor] .
In the midst of a Cabinet shake - up and a staff upheaval , [ARG0: President Trump] considered [V: firing] [ARG1: his chief of staff] [ARGM-TMP: this month] and not naming a successor .
In the midst of a Cabinet shake - up and a staff upheaval , [ARG0: President Trump] considered firing his chief of staff this month and [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: naming] [ARG1: a successor] .
